channel.title: Fire Cape
channel.description: So, I'm doing Jad for the 4th time(Died in the first 3 tries). I'm on Wave 62 and I logged out. Can anybody explain to me how am I supposed to protect Jad's hits?

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AnsUnFDAr4E&feature=plcp&context=C4eda774VDvjVQa1PpcFPTZnDD58jxjUsXklqLA02jx1thL8N9GD4%3D[/youtube]

item.title: Fire Cape
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:7, topic:435695”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=538416.msg3939316#msg3939316 date=1331285277]
If you use welfare gear like rune etc, (if you’ve got a bankpin) I can let you hold how much your risking and I can kill jad(only jad+ healers and the double 360s before jad) for you for free since i’m in a good mood ;3. pm me for my msn get in contact before you start the waves tho cause sometimes i’m busy

But basically its stomp for range and you’ll see a ball develope inside jad thats when he’s going to mage. if he looks like he’s going to mage but doesn’t do the ball he’s going to stomp. You have about 0.6seconds to pray change which is enough time if you make a wrong pray to change it to the correct one :p. If your going to give it another try gl and dont panic about the healers. just hit em once n move. don’t worry about trapping jad, its only needed if your a pure or a zerk tbh
[/quote]I got a new account from a friend and it’s maxed out. I’m using pretty maxed gear. I’ll logout at wave 62. This is my 6th time doing this.Then I’ll send ya the info. :)[/quote]
Logout at the end of wave 61 just before the 360s so i can pot up. message me your msn, and when i’m on msn i can do it for you cause i’ll be home. if you wanna watch via skype screen sharing how to do it pm your skype ;p.

Read full topic

But basically its stomp for range and you’ll see a ball develope inside jad thats when he’s going to mage. if he looks like he’s going to mage but doesn’t do the ball he’s going to stomp. You have about 0.6seconds to pray change which is enough time if you make a wrong pray to change it to the correct one :p. If your going to give it another try gl and dont panic about the healers. just hit em once n move. don’t worry about trapping jad, its only needed if your a pure or a zerk tbh[/quote]I got a new account from a friend and it’s maxed out. item.title: Fire Cape
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

If you use welfare gear like rune etc, (if you’ve got a bankpin) I can let you hold how much your risking and I can kill jad(only jad+ healers and the double 360s before jad) for you for free since i’m in a good mood ;3. pm me for my msn get in contact before you start the waves tho cause sometimes i’m busy

But basically its stomp for range and you’ll see a ball develope inside jad thats when he’s going to mage. if he looks like he’s going to mage but doesn’t do the ball he’s going to stomp. You have about 0.6seconds to pray change which is enough time if you make a wrong pray to change it to the correct one :p. If your going to give it another try gl and dont panic about the healers. just hit em once n move. don’t worry about trapping jad, its only needed if your a pure or a zerk tbh

Read full topic

item.title: Fire Cape
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

So stomp is range and the rest is mage? Sometimes when it was hitting range on me, I was protecting mage and it hit 0s.

Read full topic

item.title: Fire Cape
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

pray mage when jad spawns and listen for the stomp of range.
Safe spot him and switch between mage and range.
When healers come out attack them immediately or they’ll heal him and come back again, from there on it’s a piece of cake.

Read full topic
